event.title: played the first in London on the Friday

data.event: We would’ve played the first in London on the Friday, then come home to play on the Saturday.” “That was a team that set a lot of records and it was a really great group to be around,” the 20-year-old from Brampton said.

event.title: missed the playoffs all those years

data.event: When we missed the playoffs all those years in Erie, you’re just thinking about when you’re going to get that chance and for us, this is it.”
